name: serverless-typescript-jest
description: 1. Run `npm init -y` 2. Run `npm i -D typescript` 3. Run `npx tsc --init` 4. In `package.json` file, add     ```     "scripts": {         "build": "tsc"     }     ``` 5. Run `npm i -D jest ts-jest @types/jest` 6. Run `npx ts-jest config:init` 7. In `package.json` file, add     ```     "scripts": {         "test": "jest"     }     ``` 8. Run `npm install serverless-offline --save-dev` 9. In `serverless.yml` file, add     ```     plugins:       - serverless-offline     ``` 10. Run `npm install -D @types/aws-lambda` ### Reference * https://itnext.io/testing-with-jest-in-typescript-cc1cd0095421 * https://www.npmjs.com/package/serverless-offline
